translations: [计量]公吨（tonne 的复数）；额定载荷

sentences.sentence: The largest stones weigh over five tonnes apiece.
sentences.translation: 最大的石头每块重五吨以上。

sentences.sentence: The Wall Street Journal uses 220,000 tonnes of newsprint each year.
sentences.translation: 《华尔街日报》每年使用22万吨新闻纸。

sentences.sentence: Our cars pump out thousands of tonnes of poisonous fumes every year.
sentences.translation: 我们的汽车每年排放出成千上万吨的有毒尾气。
